sections.title: Lion Blade (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Lion Blade class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade gains no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: Master of Disguise (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade no longer suffers penalties to Disguise checks made to change her gender, race, or age.

sections.title: Move with Crowd (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: Lion blades move normally through groups of humanoids that would normally count as difficult terrain.

sections.title: Inspire Self (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade gains a competence bonus on skill checks with a particular skill through quiet chanting, lasting up to 2 minutes with concentration.

sections.title: Slowing Strike (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: On a successful sneak attack, a lion blade can deal 1 less die of damage to reduce the target's movement speed by 5 feet.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: This functions exactly like the rogue sneak attack ability, and damage bonuses stack with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Unexpected Suggestion (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: Once per day, a lion blade can use suggestion on a target she catches flat-footed, with caster level equal to class level.

sections.title: Hide in Plain Sight (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade can use Stealth while being observed if within 10 feet of dim light, but cannot hide in her own shadow.

sections.title: Expeditious Advance (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade's land speed increases by +10 feet when wearing no armor or light armor and not carrying a heavy load.

sections.title: Glean Information (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade gains a +2 bonus to social skills and can add circumstance bonuses to Knowledge checks about humanoids in her presence.

sections.title: Secret Step (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade can move up to double her speed through crowds as a move action without provoking attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Cloud the Mind (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: Observers suffer a -5 penalty on Perception checks against a stealthing lion blade, and she gains spell resistance against divination spells.

sections.title: Narrow Miss (Su) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: As a swift action, a lion blade gains 20% concealment until her next turn, usable once per day per two class levels.

sections.title: Grandmaster of Disguise (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade can improvise disguise materials for a circumstance bonus and create disguises as a full-round action with a -20 penalty.

sections.title: Silent Soul (Ex) (Lion Blade)
sections.description: A lion blade gains a +10 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks and spell resistance 20 against mind-affecting effects.
